name: The Village SF Wellness Center
description: The Village SF is a holistic approach to Native health and well-being. This six-story building in the heart of the Mission District will house social services, treatment and recovery programs, supportive housing, a health clinic, cultural and ceremony space, and a rooftop garden. It’s our way of meeting the diverse needs of San Francisco’s urban Indian community. Once completed in 2026, it will be a cornerstone of the newly-designated American Indian Cultural District. The Village opens in 2026

agency: Friendship House Association of American Indians
